posts.title: Carit
posts.description: Carit is a AI psycologyst app built with React Native, Expo, SQLite and Firebase.

posts.title: Guionify
posts.description: At Guionify we write flat rate scripts for Youtube automation or  any written content. I coded the site in 6h doing a coding speedrun to improve my skills in UI/UX Design & Front End

posts.title: UnidosEmprendedores
posts.description: UnidosEmprendedores is my Discord community which has 2700+ members. It continues to grow organically through TikTok. It contains an active job board and freelancing, as well as helping to get into the world of entrepreneurship.

comments.title: Marketing
comments.comment: I built it in 2 months while learning React Native and Expo after completing my Full Stack Developer Course

comments.title: Monetize
comments.comment: The most downloads I got was 7 bruh that is sad :(

posts.title: OvniReturns
posts.description: OvniReturns was my first profitable eCommerce. I sold OvniReturns, a kind of boomerang with an engine. It has been my most profitable eCommerce by far. In TikTok we got +295K followers and +1M likes.

posts.title: 3d design
posts.description: I attended a 3d design course for a week and I do custom designs. I also have a 3d printer that I use quite a lot. I have done several designs and do custom 3d printing at low cost.

posts.title: WayGaming
posts.description: WayGaming started by selling self-built gaming PCs iwhile covid shortage and expanded to an eCommerce.

posts.title: TitanCore T1
posts.description: TitanCore was a portable console based on GameStream technology. You could play every game possible with an 25mb/s connection. It started with a Raspberry Pi 3 and I finished it with an Intel Compute Stick with an m3. The project ended due to lack of funding, although I learned a lot.

posts.title: WayMiner
posts.description: The WayMiner was a docker server on a Raspberry Pi hosting several dvpn that produce passive income. Each one produced about $15-20 per month, but there can only be one per IP.

posts.title: WayIndustries
posts.description: WayIndustries was a multi-product dropshipping store where everyone could promote his products. I got a 10% cut on each sale.

posts.title: LazapDigital
posts.description: Business digitalization agency created in August 2022 with a member of UnidosEmprendedores. We help businesses get a quality online presence.

posts.title: CleverSkin
posts.description: CleverSkin was a ecom site that I built for a client using Shopify, Stripe. I also designed the Branding.

posts.title: Es Forti Suites
posts.description: Es Forti Suites was a site I made for renting an apartment. One of my first web projects. (HTML, CSS)

posts.title: RedditDude
posts.description: RedditDude was an automated YouTube channel with a script using the Reddit API. Videos got music, voiceover, background. (Python)
